Building things for the web

Hi, my name is Mat. I'm on a mission to help creators build successful interfaces, from desktop to mobile. I work freelance. This site aims to present a short collection of my work and thoughts. — Have a look.

  • Qordoba, a full website and innovative order form›
  • Joris Bosdriesz, a one-page video portfolio for a talented film editor›
  • M3xM, the overhaul of my personal website, now powered by Jekyll›
  • Pincil.co, a curated list of talented designers on Twitter & Dribbble›
  • Tabinikki, a minimalist & responsive Wordpress theme for writers›
  • Typesense, a single-column & responsive Wordpress theme›
